title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 990/2001 of 21 May 2001 amending Regulation (EC) No 2659/94 on detailed rules for the granting of private storage aid for Grana Padano, Parmigiano-Reggiano and Provolone cheeses
header:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 990/2001
of 21 May 2001
amending Regulation (EC) No 2659/94 on detailed rules for the granting of private storage aid for Grana Padano, Parmigiano-Reggiano and Provolone cheeses
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1255/1999 of 17 May 1999 on the common organisation of the market in milk and milk products(1), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1670/2000(2), and in particular Article 10 thereof,
Whereas:
(1) Article 6(1) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 2659/94(3), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 679/1999(4), lays down the amounts of private storage aid for Grana Padano, Parmigiano-Reggiano and Provolone cheeses. These amounts must be amended to take account of the trend in storage costs.
(2) The measures provided for in this Regulation are in accordance with the opinion of the Management Committee for Milk and Milk Products,
main_body: Article 6(1)(a) of Regulation (EC) No 2659/94 is replaced by the following: "a) EUR 75 per tonne for the fixed costs;".

This Regulation shall enter into force on the fifth day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 May 2001.
For the Commission
Franz Fischler
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 160, 26.6.1999, p. 48.
(2) OJ L 193, 29.7.2000, p. 10.
(3) OJ L 284, 1.11.1994, p. 26.
(4) OJ L 83, 27.3.1999, p. 46.
